name: NKAssetDownload
desc: An instance of the NKAssetDownload class represents an asset that is being downloaded (or has downloaded) for an issue of a Newsstand application. DeprecatedUse remote notifications to download content silently in the background. For information, see Pushing Background Updates to Your App.

items.name: func download(with: NSURLConnectionDownloadDelegate) -> NSURLConnection
items.desc: Returns a connection object and starts downloading the issue asset with a specified delegate to handle callbacks.

items.name: var identifier: String
items.desc: An identifier for the downloaded asset.

items.name: var userInfo: [AnyHashable : Any]?
items.desc: Application-specific information that is saved with the asset-download object.

items.name: var urlRequest: URLRequest
items.desc: The URL request associated with the asset download.

items.name: var issue: NKIssue?
items.desc: The issue associated with the asset download.
